author: LAS VEGAS EXOTIC COLLISION AND REPAIR
title: LAS VEGAS EXOTIC COLLISION AND REPAIR
text:
they follow up and seen to care about their clients
they have called 2 times since funding to make sure I was happy and addressed my concerns
I would recommend them to others and advise to deal directly through them and not a broker
Daniel p Convertino
